pages.title: Welcome To TerraWorld!
pages.body: This world is barren and needs your help! You will need to make it grow, populate it , and possibly defend it...

pages.title: Getting started
pages.body: See the Asteroids floating around? Click them , and watch them smash into the Planet! Destructive, sure, but it is the main source of ice, which will melt into water.

pages.title: Firing the lasers!
pages.body: Press "Q" and "E" to set menu to "Land" or "Farm". Then hold Space and sweep the ship with "A" and "D" to set the land before for forest or farmland

pages.title: Storms and Growth
pages.body: As the lake grows, storms will appear, and rain on the planet below, growing plants and trees. Try growing 40 plants and 100 trees to see what happens next!

pages.title: Storms and Growth
pages.body: As the lake grows, storms will appear, and rain on the planet below, growing plants and trees. Try growing 40 plants and 100 trees to see what happens next!

pages.title: Bring in the People
pages.body: A new Menu option has appeared! Navigate to the Build Menu, and build the Rocket Platform

pages.title: Town Mayor
pages.body: You now have access to the Town Menu. Here you can see the population, the happiness level, and the job priority tabs

pages.title: Setting Jobs
pages.body: The cards in the Town Menu set the job priority. Clicking a card will set it as top priority, and the surrounding cards as secondary

pages.title: Population Growth
pages.body: the town needs food, without it they will die! Try to get your population up to 200

pages.title: Time To mine!
pages.body: To get anywhere tech wise we need to some metal. Lets dig!

pages.title: Hot stuff
pages.body: The smelter takes in ore, oxygen, and wood, and returns with some valuable metal bars

pages.title: Study time
pages.body: The research tab brings in all kinds of goodies, but to get started, send some of your dudes to research in the jobs tab.
